SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am45
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am45.controller

Class GamesController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am45.controller.GamesController
public class GamesController extends Object
This class is responsible for managing the games in the application. It maintains a list of all active games and provides methods to create, delete, and join games. It also handles the communication between the server and the clients.

  • Constructor Details

    • GamesController

      private GamesController()
      Private constructor for the singleton pattern. Initializes the games and clients maps.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static GamesController getInstance()
      Returns the singleton instance of the GamesController. If the instance does not exist, it is created.
      Returns:
      the singleton instance of the GamesController

    • createGame

      public Game createGame(int gameID, int numOfPlayers, String nickname, TokenColor color, ServerHandler serverHandler)
      Creates a new game with the given parameters. If a game with the same ID already exists, returns null.
      Parameters:
      gameID - the ID of the game to be created
      numOfPlayers - the number of players in the game
      nickname - the nickname of the player creating the game
      serverHandler - the server socket of the player creating the game
      Returns:
      the created game, or null if a game with the same ID already exists

    • deleteGame

      public void deleteGame(int gameID)
      Deletes a game with the given ID. Also removes all clients associated with the game.
      Parameters:
      gameID - the ID of the game to be deleted

    • sendMSG

      public void sendMSG(Messages message, ServerHandler serverHandler)
      Sends a message to all clients in the game associated with the server handler.
      Parameters:
      message - the message to be sent to all clients. It must be a subclass of ServerToClient.
      serverHandler - the server socket of the player to send the message to.

    • joinGame

      public void joinGame(int gameID, String nickname, TokenColor color, ServerHandler serverHandler)
      Allows a player to join a game. Sends appropriate messages to the client ba on the state of the game and the player's nickname.
      Parameters:
      gameID - the ID of the game to join
      nickname - the nickname of the player joining the game
      serverHandler - the server socket of the player joining the game

    • startGame

      public void startGame(int GameID)
      Starts a game with the given ID. Checks if all players are in the game before starting it.
      Parameters:
      GameID - the ID of the game to start

    • onCommandReceived

      public void onCommandReceived(ClientToServer message)
      Handles a command received from a client.
      Parameters:
      message - the command received from the client

    • onDisconnect

      public void onDisconnect(ServerHandler serverHandler, Game game)
      Handles a client disconnecting from a game. Removes the client from the game and sends an update to all other players.
      Parameters:
      serverHandler - the server socket of the client that disconnected
      game - the game from which the client disconnected

    • sendEveryPlayerTCP

      public void sendEveryPlayerTCP(Game game, ServerToClient message)
      Sends a message to all players in a game.
      Parameters:
      game - the game to send the message to
      message - the message to send

    • serverHandlerToGame

      private void serverHandlerToGame(Game game, ServerHandler serverHandler)
      This method associates a ServerHandler with a Game in the clients map. If the Game is not already in the map, it adds a new entry with an empty list of ServerHandlers.
      Parameters:
      game - The game to associate the ServerHandler with.
      serverHandler - The ServerHandler to associate with the Game.

    • requestUpdate

      public void requestUpdate(int gameID)
      Sends an update to all players in a game.
      Parameters:
      gameID - the game to send the update to

    • requestPlayingUpdate

      public void requestPlayingUpdate(int gameID, ServerHandler serverRequestSocket)
      This method associates a ServerHandler with a Game in the client's map. If the Game is not already in the map, it adds a new entry with an empty list of ServerHandlers.
      Parameters:
      gameID - The game to associate the ServerHandler with.
      serverRequestSocket - The ServerHandler to associate with the Game.

    • flipCard

      public void flipCard(int position, ServerHandler serverHandler)
      This method flips a card at a given position in the game associated with the server handler. The action is performed on behalf of the player associated with the server handler.
      Parameters:
      position - The position of the card to flip.
      serverHandler - The server handler associated with the game.

    • flipMarketCard

      public void flipMarketCard(int position, ServerHandler serverHandler)
      This method flips a market card at a given position in the game associated with the server handler.
      Parameters:
      position - The position of the market card to flip.
      serverHandler - The server handler associated with the game.

    • playCard

      public void playCard(int position, int x, int y, ServerHandler serverHandler)
      This method plays a card at a given position in the game associated with the server handler.
      Parameters:
      position - The position of the card to play.
      x - The x coordinate of the card to play.
      y - The y coordinate of the card to play.
      serverHandler - The server handler associated with the game.

    • sendMessage

      public void sendMessage(String message, ServerHandler serverHandler)
      This method sends a message to all players in the game associated with the server handler.
      Parameters:
      message - The message to send to the players.
      serverHandler - The server handler associated with the game.

    • drawCard

      public void drawCard(int position, ServerHandler serverHandler)
      This method draws a card at a given position in the game associated with the server handler.
      Parameters:
      position - The position of the card to draw.
      serverHandler - The server handler associated with the game.

    • chooseObj

      public void chooseObj(Boolean position, ServerHandler serverHandler)
      This method chooses an object based on the position in the game associated with the server handler.
      Parameters:
      position - The position of the object to choose.
      serverHandler - The server handler associated with the game.

    • sendHand

      public void sendHand(String nickname, Game game, List<String> hand)
      This method sends a player's hand to the client and updates the RMI controller.
      Parameters:
      nickname - The player's nickname.
      game - The game instance.
      hand - The player's hand.

    • sendChoice

      public void sendChoice(String nickname, Game game, String choice, String obj1, String obj2)
      This method sends the choice to a specific player and updates the RMI controller.
      Parameters:
      nickname - The player's nickname.
      game - The game instance.
      choice - The choice to be sent.
      obj1 - The first object to be sent.
      obj2 - The second object to be sent.

    • sendResource

      public void sendResource(String nickname, Game game, List<Integer> resource)
      This method sends a resource update to a specific player and updates the RMI controller.
      Parameters:
      nickname - The player's nickname.
      game - The game instance.
      resource - The resources to be sent.

    • sendMessageToPlayer

      public void sendMessageToPlayer(String nickname, Game game, ServerToClient message)
      This method sends a message to a specific player.
      Parameters:
      nickname - The player's nickname.
      game - The game instance.
      message - The message to be sent.

    • updatePlayersBoard

      public void updatePlayersBoard(Game game)
      This method updates the boards of all players in a game and sends the updates to the clients.
      Parameters:
      game - The game instance whose player boards are to be updated.

    • containsSocketName

      private boolean containsSocketName(String nick, Game game)
      This method checks if a given nickname is associated with any ServerHandler in a specific game.
      Parameters:
      nick - The nickname to check.
      game - The game instance to search in.
      Returns:
      true if the nickname is found, false otherwise.

    • getClients

      public HashMap<Game,List<ServerHandler>> getClients()
      This method returns the map of games and their associated server handlers.
      Returns:
      A HashMap where the key is a Game instance, and the value is a list of ServerHandlers.

    • winnerUpdate

      public void winnerUpdate(Game game, List<String> winnerPlayers)
      This method sends a winner update to all players in a game and updates the RMI controller.
      Parameters:
      game - The game instance.
      winnerPlayers - The list of players who won the game.

    • turnsUpdate

      public void turnsUpdate(Game game, String nickname)
      This method sends a turn update to all players in a game and updates the RMI controller.
      Parameters:
      game - The game instance.
      nickname - The nickname of the player whose turn it is.

    • marketUpdate

      public void marketUpdate(Game game, List<String> marketUpdate)
      This method sends a market update to all players in a game and updates the RMI controller.
      Parameters:
      game - The game instance.
      marketUpdate - The list of market updates.

    • chatUpdate

      public void chatUpdate(Game game, Stack<String> messages)
      This method sends a chat update to all players in a game and updates the RMI controller.
      Parameters:
      game - The game instance.
      messages - The list of chat messages.

    • getGames

      public HashMap<Integer,Game> getGames()
      Returns:
      the map of games and their associated server handlers.

    • sendMessageToServer

      private static void sendMessageToServer(Messages message, ServerHandler serverHandler)
